name: SolarSystemProject (ahiyantra)
description:
An interactive model of the inner solar system created as a part of an coursera course on game design & development by michigan state university (using unity engine's version 2020). 

Modifications made on top of the guided parts: added mercury, venus & mars (alongside phobos & deimos)

Created by: Swarn "A. Y." S. Warshaneyan
